ItemType.name: DM600 disposable missile rack
ItemType.description: This disposable weapon system is loaded with sixteen KM100 missiles. The weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.description: Soon after release, the Bolide was obsoleted by EI's turbolaser cannon, though some insist the Bolide is a better weapon for the price.

ItemType.name: DM1500 disposable missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM1500 is loaded with sixteen KM500 tracking missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons manufactured by Earth Industries.

ItemType.name: fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.description: The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate double that of the ubiquitous laser.

ItemType.name: heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of four shells.

ItemType.name: laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons joined in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: Moskva 11 light turret
ItemType.description: This omnidirectional turret fires powerful high-explosive shells, but its range is very limited.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional laser cannon
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: NAMI missile launcher
ItemType.description: This launcher is compatible with a full range of popular missiles including the KM100 Longbows and the XM900 Lucifers.

ItemType.name: AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser SmartCannon
ItemType.description: Rasiermesser brought the SmartCannon to market despite opposition from law enforcement. The weapon requires SmartCannon rounds.

ItemType.name: dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons manufactured by NAMI.

ItemType.name: turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: AK505 Ballista cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Ballista cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon fires small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: MAG launcher
ItemType.description: The MAG launcher is a flexible and sophisticated grenade launcher that is compatible with a large range of MAG munitions.

ItemType.name: particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: PK25 Morning Star cannon
ItemType.description: NAMI's Morning Star cannon shoots a high-velocity cloud of dense particles that can severely damage light to medium armor.

ItemType.name: Moskva 21 dual cannon
ItemType.description: This dual cannon shoots high-explosive shells in a scattered pattern.

ItemType.name: RK15 Partisan turret
ItemType.description: An omnidirectional version of the Partisan cannon.

ItemType.name: slam cannon
ItemType.description: The slam cannon fires high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: dual turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: Turbolasers in a twin configuration have became popular with pirates and marauders.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: A single turbolaser mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 cannon
ItemType.description: The Akan 30 is a powerful cannon designed by the Rasiermesser Corporation. This weapon requires Akan 30 cannon shells.

ItemType.name: dual Flenser cannon
ItemType.description: The ultimate kinetic weapon, 60% more powerful than the AK505 Ballista.

ItemType.name: EMP cannon
ItemType.description: This cannon shoots out a stream of ionized particles that disrupts the control systems on most starships.

ItemType.name: lancer cannon
ItemType.description: The lancer cannon is a high-powered beam weapon.

ItemType.name: Makayev launcher
ItemType.description: The Makayev consists of fast launch tubes compatible with the Strelka series of light missiles.

ItemType.name: mark I howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark I howitzer fires heavy, high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: dual particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional particle cannon
ItemType.description: A single particle beam weapon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: Shuriken neutron blaster
ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, this Bushido Corp design uses a double chamber to fire high-energy neutrons.

ItemType.name: Moskva 33 repeater
ItemType.description: One of the most successful Makayev designs, the Moskva repeater fires a cluster of high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: heavy slam cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier and more powerful version of the slam cannon.

ItemType.name: x-ray laser cannon
ItemType.description: A nuclear-powered laser source is the core of this weapon system.

ItemType.name: Akan 600 turret
ItemType.description: This weapons places an Akan 30 cannon on a computer-controlled, omnidirectional turret. This weapon requires Akan 30 cannon shells.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile system
ItemType.description: This cheap cartridge missile launcher fires three micro-missiles at a ten-degree spread. The weapon requires Dragonfly missile cartridges.

ItemType.name: mark III howitzer
ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the mark I howitzer.

ItemType.name: TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: This versatile weapon, developed by Earth Industries, has been adopted by the Commonwealth Fleet.

ItemType.name: Hanzo blaster
ItemType.attributes: bushido, commonwealth, energyWeapon, majorItem, military, specialty
ItemType.description: The top-of-the-line weapon manufactured by the Bushido corporation. This weapon consists of dual particle weapons linked by a high-speed control system.

ItemType.name: ion disruptor
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, EI, energyWeapon, military, majorItem, specialty
ItemType.description: The ion disruptor's beam can penetrate a ship's hull and ionize the delicate mechanisms of weapons and other devices.

ItemType.name: light ion blaster
ItemType.description: EI consistently denies rumors that it used stolen Ares schematics to develop this line of ion weapons.

ItemType.name: Katana star cannon
ItemType.attributes: bushido, commonwealth, energyWeapon, majorItem, military, specialty
ItemType.description: The star cannon fires a stream of high-energy ions that continue to cause damage as they punch through armor.

ItemType.name: mark V howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark V howitzer fires a light thermonuclear shell.

ItemType.name: NAMI mine launcher
ItemType.description: The NAMI mine launcher is used by the Commonwealth Fleet to defend colonies in Ares space.

ItemType.name: dual TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: Two TeV 9 blasters linked by a common fire control.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: A single TeV 9 blaster mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: thermo cannon
ItemType.description: Produced in great numbers in the Syrtis War, the cannon is now common throughout the Outer Realm. The cannon requires thermo cannon shells.

ItemType.name: tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space.

ItemType.name: ion blaster
ItemType.description: The ion blaster fires a bolt of ionized particles.

ItemType.name: ion flame cannon
ItemType.description: The ion flame cannon fires multiple ion blasts in an arc in front of the ship.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser launcher
ItemType.description: After the success of the SmartCannon, the Rasiermesser corporation developed a line of missiles for the military.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional thermo cannon
ItemType.description: This is a modified thermo cannon mounted on an automated turret. It requires thermo cannon shells.

ItemType.name: TM7 multitarget cannon
ItemType.description: Taikon's TM7 cannon launches warheads that split into three independent missiles. The cannon requires TM7 warheads.

ItemType.name: heavy ion blaster
ItemType.description: This is a more powerful version of the ion blaster.

ItemType.name: NAMI heavy launcher
ItemType.description: The NAMI heavy launcher is designed for the capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional ion blaster
ItemType.description: Similar in design to the ion blaster, but mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: advanced tritium cannon
ItemType.description: This improved version can fire at quadruple the rate of the tritium cannon. Unfortunately, the cannon overheats quickly if fired continuously.

ItemType.name: IM90 multitarget blaster
ItemType.description: Taikon's IM90 blaster mounts three independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: plasma cannon
ItemType.description: This weapon emits a powerful plasma burst that can incinerate an unprotected ship.

ItemType.name: KM100 Longbow missile
ItemType.attributes: basicAmmo, commonwealth, consumable, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive missile; cheap and light, they are the weapon of choice for modern patrol fleets.

ItemType.name: KM110 Starburst missile
ItemType.attributes: basicAmmo, commonwealth, consumable, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher
ItemType.description: The warhead of this NAMI-compatible missile explodes into more than a dozen high-velocity shards.

ItemType.name: KM120 Brute missile
ItemType.description: This is a heavier and more powerful version of the KM100.

ItemType.name: KM500 Stiletto missile
ItemType.attributes: basicAmmo, commonwealth, consumable, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher
ItemType.description: A powerful optical and infrared tracking module allows this missile to home in on its target.

ItemType.name: XM300 Reaper missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: The XM300 warhead is jacketed with small amounts of plutonium. Though not enough for fission, the radioactive materials contaminate the target.

ItemType.name: KM550 Broadsword missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher
ItemType.description: The Broadsword missile is a heavier version of the tracking KM500 series.

ItemType.name: XM900 Lucifer missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMILauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: An optical tracking missile carrying a 100-kiloton thermonuclear warhead. The XM900 is tightly controlled; only military vessels may carry them.

ItemType.name: 400 hexagene MAG
ItemType.attributes: basicAmmo, commonwealth, consumable, MAGLauncher, missile, rasiermesser
ItemType.description: This is a standard hexagene high-explosive grenade compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 600 hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: This is a larger version of the 400 MAG grenade. It is compatible with the MAG launcher.

ItemType.name: 800F hexagene MAG
ItemType.description: The largest MAG in common use, the 800 series packs twice as much hexagene as the 400 MAG and surrounds it with a fragmentation jacket.

ItemType.name: JB2 shield buster MAG
ItemType.description: This specialized MAG is designed to inflict enhanced damage to energy fields.

ItemType.name: ZG24 cluster MAG
ItemType.description: The ZG24 cluster MAG is a cluster grenade that explodes into dozens of smaller hexagene explosives.

ItemType.name: 3K siege MAG
ItemType.description: This heavy MAG grenade packs 25 kilos of hexagene\x97enough to blast through the heavy armor of fortresses and military installations.

ItemType.name: 98R high-flux MAG
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, MAGLauncher, military, missile, premiumAmmo, rasiermesser
ItemType.description: The only military variant of the popular MAG series is this thermonuclear and radiological variant.

ItemType.name: White Strelka missile
ItemType.attributes: basicAmmo, commonwealth, consumable, missile, makayev, makayevLauncher
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The White Strelka is the cheapest and least powerful of the series.

ItemType.name: Green Strelka missile
ItemType.description: The Strelka series of light missiles is compatible with the Makayev launcher. The Green Strelka packs more punch than the White version.

ItemType.name: Red Strelka missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, makayev, makayevLauncher
ItemType.description: The Red Strelka is a thermonuclear version of the Makayev-compatible missile series.

ItemType.name: Black Strelka missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, makayev, makayevLauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: The rare and powerful Black Strelka releases a dozen thermonuclear submunitions. It is compatible with the Makayev launcher.

ItemType.name: CRM100 Fatboy mine
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMIMineLauncher
ItemType.description: The CRM100 is a thermonuclear static mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: CRM500 Running Man mine
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMIMineLauncher
ItemType.description: The CRM500 is a tracking thermonuclear mine deployed by the NAMI mine launcher.

ItemType.name: Gotha-10 missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, rasiermesser, rasiermesserLauncher
ItemType.description: This hypervelocity missile is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: Gotha-400 seeker
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, consumable, military, missile, rasiermesser, rasiermesserLauncher
ItemType.description: This is a tracking missile with a kiloton-yield warhead. It is compatible with the Rasiermesser launcher.

ItemType.name: M2 Vulcan missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMIHeavyLauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: The M2 is a heavy siege weapon launched by the NAMI heavy launcher. It is designed to attack capital ships and stations.

ItemType.name: S3 Medusa missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMIHeavyLauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: Soon after launch, the S3 Medusa explodes to reveal a dozen independently-tracking thermonuclear missiles. The S3 requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: M5 Nemesis missile
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthFleet, consumable, military, missile, NAMI, NAMIHeavyLauncher, premiumAmmo
ItemType.description: The M5 Nemesis missile is an upgraded version of the M2. It requires the NAMI heavy launcher.

ItemType.name: SmartCannon round
ItemType.description: SmartCannons are recoilless weapons modified to shoot special tracking shells. A SmartCannon round can adjust its path to strike a designated target.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 cannon shell cartridge
ItemType.description: This shell cartridge is used by the Akan 30 cannon.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile cartridge
ItemType.description: This is a cartridge for the Dragonfly missile system. Each cartridge contains three micro-missiles.

ItemType.name: thermo cannon shell cartridge
ItemType.description: Fired by thermo cannons, these rounds pack the yield of a nuclear device in a small, mass-produced shell.

ItemType.name: TM7 warhead
ItemType.description: These warheads are launched by Taikon's TM7 multitarget cannon.
